summary: Alvin and the Chipmunks is an American music group made up of three cartoon chipmunks: Alvin, Simon, and Theodore. They were created in 1958 by Ross Bagdasarian, who used a special recording technique to make the chipmunks' voices. The group became famous for their songs and have sold millions of records. They've won many awards and even have a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame. The Chipmunks have been in TV shows and movies, bringing joy to kids for over 60 years.
title: Alvin and the Chipmunks
